basic.description: This course covers thermodynamics, kinetic theory of gases, reaction kinetics, as well as introductions to quantum mechanics and to statistical mechanics.
basic.subject: CHM
basic.title: Physical Chemistry I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CHM 1045 and CHM 1045L with a grade of "C-" or better or instructor permission.   MAC 2312 with a grade of "C-" or better.   MAC 2313 with a grade of "C-" or better recommended. Corequisite: PHY 2049C.
